verbs.description: [V: Zack] [ARG0: Beauchamp] [ARGM-LOC: at Vox] explains how Fox News , th wingnutosphere and Donald Trump have formed a feedback loop of dishonest and ridiculous conspiracy theories in an attempt to undermine the Mueller investigation . He summarizes the findings of Jedd Legum about the spygate nonsense that Trump just keeps pushing . On Monday afternoon , an anonymous Twitter account notes that …
